sentences: This issue was considered in a spin-off group facilitated by Alexa Kleysteuber (Chile).
Kleysteuber reported to the AWG-LCA stocktaking contact group that the group discussions were based on an informal note containing a map of elements that need to be addressed.
On a framework for various approaches, she said parties exchanged views on purposes and roles.
On a new market mechanism she underscored productive exchanges on modalities and procedures.
